title: Large-Scale Fire Safety Education Expert Workshop Design for the Elderly

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Instructional Design Theories and Basic Knowledge of Elderly Safety
context.additional_context: Acquiring Methods for Designing Fire Safety Education Curricula and Workshops for Elderly Populations in Online Environments, with Project-Based Assessment

learning_goals: Learners can design three types of fire safety education curricula tailored to elderly living environments (e.g., nursing homes, independent living facilities).
Learners can produce customized workshop materials for three target groups (facility staff, homecare providers, elderly living alone) by applying expert development methodologies.
Learners can develop age-friendly educational materials combining print and audiovisual resources.

resources: Fire Safety Training Expert Interview Video

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
